snippet: Douglas Kass, the handpicked “credentialed bear” for this year’s Berkshire Hathaway meeting, says that Warren Buffett answered maybe 80 percent of his questions. But he retained a high level of respect for the billionaire.
abstract: Douglas Kass, the handpicked “credentialed bear” for this year’s Berkshire Hathaway meeting, says that Warren Buffett answered maybe 80 percent of his questions. But he retained a high level of respect for the billionaire.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Berkshire's Bear on Tangling With a Master of Question-Dodging
